trans-unit.source: Represents an individual data item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的個別資料項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ListViewDataItem class represents an individual data item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: ListViewDataItem 類別表示中的個別資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A data item usually corresponds to a record in a data source object.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目通常會對應至資料來源物件中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control has a designated item type that is represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項具有指定之項目類型所表示之<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem.ItemType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When the item type is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>, you can use the ListViewDataItem class to get more information about the item.
trans-unit.target: 當項目類型是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>，您可以使用 ListViewDataItem 類別，以取得項目的相關詳細資訊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control stores data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項儲存資料中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a ListViewDataItem object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷 ListViewDataItem 物件中的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the data item in the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷基礎資料來源中的資料項目的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between these index properties is that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> represents the position of the data item in the current page, whereas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> is based on the page offset.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引內容之間的差異在於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>代表資料項目的位置，在目前頁面中，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>頁面位移為基礎。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the paging functionality is not enabled in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control, these two properties will contain the same value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在未啟用分頁功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控制項，這兩個屬性會包含相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties of the underlying data object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取基礎資料物件的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewDataItem class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 ListViewDataItem 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `dataItemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>|The value of the `displayIndex` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>|值`dataItemIndex`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>|值`displayIndex`參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>基礎資料來源物件中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: The position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示之資料項目的位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying data object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref> object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在基礎資料物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref>物件繫結至。

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property is available only during and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: DataItem 屬性時，可使用只在下列期間之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound>

trans-unit.source: The underlying data object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref> object is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem"></xref>物件繫結至。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>基礎資料來源物件中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataItemIndex 屬性來判斷索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>基礎資料來源物件中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*> in the underlying data source object.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>基礎資料來源物件中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DataItem*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料項目的位置中所顯示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayIndex property corresponds to the current position of the item as displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: DisplayIndex 屬性會對應至目前位置的項目，如下面的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Each item's DisplayIndex value reflects the order in which they were added to the control in that particular page of data.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目 DisplayIndex 值會反映到特定的資料頁面中的控制項所加入的順序。

trans-unit.source: You can use the DisplayIndex property to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的 DisplayIndex 屬性擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: It does not apply to insert items or empty items.
trans-unit.target: 它不適用於插入項目或空白項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the data item as displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示之資料項目的以零為起始的位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要在事件頁面的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been sent to the parent control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已傳送至父控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
